text.description:
SSTC* At 646 sq ft, this exceptional bright and spacious one bedroom apartment is located on the first floor of Richardson Mews, an exclusive new development of 1, 2 and 3 bedroom luxury apartments.

Set back from the thoroughfare, the apartment offers a large private terrace measuring approximately 160 Sq Ft of external space with direct access from the reception room via large floor to ceiling glazed doors.

Set behind a fully refurbished, red brick period facade, the property offers high specification throughout, including; Miele and Bosch appliances, under floor heating, composite stone work tops and engineered wood flooring.

Located *11 minutes from the heart of leafy Highgate Village and *8 minutes from Highgate Underground, the property is excellently located transport and amenities along with the open spaces provided over and beyond Highgate Hill.

**Incentive- Designer Furniture package included.


*Google Maps
** Subject to offer level.

For a blend of historic London village atmosphere, desirability and an enviable list of the best of London's green spaces, all mixed with ease of access to everything the capital has to offer,

Highgate is an unparallelled location.
